channel.title: Use your own player on Security365 Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Use your own player on Security365 Docs

item.title: Web
item.description: WebCloudflare Stream works with all web video players that support HLS and DASH. Before you can play videos, you must first upload a video to Cloudflare Stream or be actively streaming to a live input ​​ Examples Video.js HLS reference player (hls.js) DASH reference player (dash.js) Vidstack

item.title: iOS
item.description: iOSYou can stream both on-demand and live video to native iOS, tvOS and macOS apps using AVPlayer External link icon Open external link . Before you can play videos, you must first upload a video to Cloudflare Stream or be actively streaming to a live input ​​ Example Apps iOS ​​ Using AVPlayer Play a video from Cloudflare Stream using AVPlayer: import SwiftUI import AVKit struct MyView: View { // Change the url to the Cloudflare Stream HLS manifest URL private let player = AVPlayer(url: URL(string: "https://customer-9cbb9x7nxdw5hb57.

item.title: Android
item.description: AndroidYou can stream both on-demand and live video to native Android apps using ExoPlayer External link icon Open external link . Before you can play videos, you must first upload a video to Cloudflare Stream or be actively streaming to a live input ​​ Example Apps Android ​​ Using ExoPlayer Play a video from Cloudflare Stream using ExoPlayer: implementation 'com.google.android.exoplayer:exoplayer-hls:2.X.X' SimpleExoPlayer player = new SimpleExoPlayer.Builder(context).build(); // Set the media item to the Cloudflare Stream HLS Manifest URL: player.
